mapper.sql:
where 1=1
and wms_order_check_pallet_.check_pallet_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.checkPalletId},'%')
and wms_order_check_pallet_.check_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.checkId},'%')
and wms_order_check_pallet_.order_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.orderNo},'%')
and wms_order_check_pallet_.goods_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.goodsName},'%')
and wms_order_check_pallet_.goods_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.goodsCode},'%')
and wms_order_check_pallet_.location_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.locationCode},'%')
and wms_order_check_pallet_.diff_flag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.diffFlag},'%')
and wms_order_check_pallet_.batch_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.batchNo},'%')
and wms_order_check_pallet_.pallet_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.palletCode},'%')
and wms_order_check_pallet_.amount LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.amount},'%')
and wms_order_check_pallet_.real_amount LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.realAmount},'%')
and wms_order_check_pallet_.remark LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.remark},'%')
and wms_order_check_pallet_.user_defined1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined1},'%')
and wms_order_check_pallet_.user_defined2 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined2},'%')
and wms_order_check_pallet_.user_defined3 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined3},'%')
and wms_order_check_pallet_.user_defined4 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined4},'%')
and wms_order_check_pallet_.user_defined5 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined5},'%')
and wms_order_check_pallet_.create_by LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.createBy},'%')
and wms_order_check_pallet_.gmt_create LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.gmtCreate},'%')
and wms_order_check_pallet_.last_modified_by LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.lastModifiedBy},'%')
and wms_order_check_pallet_.gmt_modified LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.gmtModified},'%')
and wms_order_check_pallet_.active_flag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.activeFlag},'%')
mapper.update:
update wms_order_check_pallet
check_id = #{entity.checkId},
order_no = #{entity.orderNo},
goods_name = #{entity.goodsName},
goods_code = #{entity.goodsCode},
location_code = #{entity.locationCode},
diff_flag = #{entity.diffFlag},
batch_no = #{entity.batchNo},
pallet_code = #{entity.palletCode},
amount = #{entity.amount},
real_amount = #{entity.realAmount},
remark = #{entity.remark},
user_defined1 = #{entity.userDefined1},
user_defined2 = #{entity.userDefined2},
user_defined3 = #{entity.userDefined3},
user_defined4 = #{entity.userDefined4},
user_defined5 = #{entity.userDefined5},
create_by = #{entity.createBy},
gmt_create = #{entity.gmtCreate},
last_modified_by = #{entity.lastModifiedBy},
gmt_modified = #{entity.gmtModified},
active_flag = #{entity.activeFlag},
where check_pallet_id = #{entity.checkPalletId}
mapper.delete: delete from wms_order_check_pallet where check_id = #{entity.checkId} and active_flag = '1'
delete from wms_order_check_pallet where order_no = #{entity.orderNo} and active_flag = '1'
mapper.select: SELECT t.check_pallet_id, s.allow_mix, s.use_status, t.check_id, t.order_no, t.goods_name, t.goods_code, t.location_code, t.diff_flag, t.batch_no, t.pallet_code, t.amount, t.real_amount, t.remark, t.user_defined1, t.user_defined2, t.user_defined3, t.user_defined4, t.user_defined5, t.create_by, t.gmt_create, t.last_modified_by, t.gmt_modified, t.active_flag FROM wms_order_check_pallet t JOIN wms_location_stereoscopic s ON t.pallet_code = s.pallet_code AND t.location_code = s.location_code AND t.active_flag = '1' AND s.active_flag = '1' WHERE t.order_no = #{entity.orderNo} ORDER BY s.shelves_number ASC, s.column_number ASC, s.layer_number DESC, RIGHT (s.location_code, 1) ASC

SELECT t.location_code, t.use_status FROM wms_location_stereoscopic t WHERE LEFT (t.location_code, 4) IN ( SELECT LEFT (t.location_code, 4) FROM wms_order_check_pallet t WHERE t.order_no = #{entity.orderNo} AND t.active_flag = '1' )
